variable.name: SUBJECT_ID
variable.description: PARTICIPANT ID [Visit 9] [Medical History Form, MHX]

variable.name: VISIT
variable.description: CONTACT OCCASION [Visit 9] [Medical History Form, MHX]

variable.name: MHXC1
variable.description: Q1. A. Chest pain on effort. Since your last Jackson Heart Study exam on (mm/dd/yyyy) have you had any pain or discomfort in your chest? [Visit 9] [Medical History Form, MHX]

variable.name: MHXC2
variable.description: Q2. A. Chest pain on effort. Do you get it when you walk uphill or hurry? [Visit 9] [Medical History Form, MHX]

variable.name: MHXC3
variable.description: Q3. A. Chest pain on effort. Do you get it when you walk at an ordinary pace on the level? [Visit 9] [Medical History Form, MHX]

variable.name: MHXC4
variable.description: Q4. A. Chest pain on effort. What do you do if you get it while you are walking? [Visit 9] [Medical History Form, MHX]

variable.name: MHXC5
variable.description: Q5. A. Chest pain on effort. If you stand still, what happens to it? [Visit 9] [Medical History Form, MHX]

variable.name: MHXC6
variable.description: Q6. A. Chest pain on effort. How soon? [Visit 9] [Medical History Form, MHX]

variable.name: MHXC7A
variable.description: Q7a. A. Chest pain on effort. Sternum (upper or middle) [Visit 9] [Medical History Form, MHX]

variable.name: MHXC7B
variable.description: Q7b. A. Chest pain on effort. Sternum (lower) [Visit 9] [Medical History Form, MHX]

variable.name: MHXC7C
variable.description: Q7c. A. Chest pain on effort. Left anterior chest [Visit 9] [Medical History Form, MHX]

variable.name: MHXC7D
variable.description: Q7d. A. Chest pain on effort. Left arm [Visit 9] [Medical History Form, MHX]

variable.name: MHXC7E
variable.description: Q7e. A. Chest pain on effort. Other [Visit 9] [Medical History Form, MHX]

variable.name: MHXC8
variable.description: Q8. A. Chest pain on effort. Do you feel it anywhere else? [Visit 9] [Medical History Form, MHX]

variable.name: MHXC9
variable.description: Q9. A. Chest pain on effort. Did you see a doctor because of this pain or discomfort? [Visit 9] [Medical History Form, MHX]

variable.name: MHXC10
variable.description: Q10. A. Chest pain on effort. What did the doctor say it was? [Visit 9] [Medical History Form, MHX]

variable.name: MHXC11
variable.description: Q11. A. Chest pain on effort. Have you been hospitalized because of this pain? [Visit 9] [Medical History Form, MHX]

variable.name: MHXC12
variable.description: Q12. A. Chest pain on effort. How long ago did you start getting this pain? Within the past: [Visit 9] [Medical History Form, MHX]

variable.name: MHXC13
variable.description: Q13. A. Chest pain on effort. Within the past 2 months, has your chest discomfort occurred more often? [Visit 9] [Medical History Form, MHX]

variable.name: MHXC14
variable.description: Q14. A. Chest pain on effort. Has it occurred at least twice as often as before? [Visit 9] [Medical History Form, MHX]

variable.name: MHXC15
variable.description: Q15. A. Chest pain on effort. Within the past 2 months, has the pain become more severe? [Visit 9] [Medical History Form, MHX]

variable.name: MHXC16
variable.description: Q16. A. Chest pain on effort. Within the past 2 months, has the pain lasted longer when it occurs? [Visit 9] [Medical History Form, MHX]

variable.name: MHXC17
variable.description: Q17. A. Chest pain on effort. Do you ever use nitroglycerin to relieve the pain? [Visit 9] [Medical History Form, MHX]

variable.name: MHXC18
variable.description: Q18. A. Chest pain on effort. Within the past 2 months, has the pain required more nitroglycerin to relieve it? [Visit 9] [Medical History Form, MHX]

variable.name: MHXC19
variable.description: Q19. A. Chest pain on effort. Within the past 2 months, have you started getting the pain with less exertion? [Visit 9] [Medical History Form, MHX]

variable.name: MHXC20
variable.description: Q20. A. Chest pain on effort. Within the past 2 months have you started getting the pain when sitting still? [Visit 9] [Medical History Form, MHX]

variable.name: MHXC21
variable.description: Q21. A. Chest pain on effort. Within the past 2 months, have you started getting the pain when sleeping? [Visit 9] [Medical History Form, MHX]

variable.name: MHXC22
variable.description: Q22. B. Possible infraction. Since your last Jackson Heart Study exam, have you ever had a severe pain across the front of your chest lasting for half an hour or more? [Visit 9] [Medical History Form, MHX]

variable.name: MHXC23
variable.description: Q23. B. Possible infraction. Did you see a doctor because of this pain? [Visit 9] [Medical History Form, MHX]

variable.name: MHXC24
variable.description: Q24. B. Possible infraction. What did the doctor say it was? [Visit 9] [Medical History Form, MHX]

variable.name: MHXC25
variable.description: Q25. B. Possible infraction. Since your last Jackson Heart Study exam, have you ever had a heart attack for which you were hospitalized one week or more? [Visit 9] [Medical History Form, MHX]

variable.name: MHXC26
variable.description: Q26. B. Possible infraction. How many such heart attacks have you had? [Visit 9] [Medical History Form, MHX]

variable.name: MHXC27
variable.description: Q27. B. Possible infraction. How old were you when you had your (first) heart attack? [Visit 9] [Medical History Form, MHX]

variable.name: MHXC28
variable.description: Q28. B. Possible infraction. Have you ever had a test in which you were asked to exercise while an electrocardiogram was taken? [Visit 9] [Medical History Form, MHX]

variable.name: MHXC29
variable.description: Q29. B. Possible infraction. Were you told that the results were normal or abnormal? [Visit 9] [Medical History Form, MHX]

variable.name: MHXC30
variable.description: Q30. C. Intermittent claudication. Do you get pain in either leg on walking? [Visit 9] [Medical History Form, MHX]

variable.name: MHXC31
variable.description: Q31. C. Intermittent claudication. Does this pain ever begin when you are standing still or sitting? [Visit 9] [Medical History Form, MHX]

variable.name: MHXC32
variable.description: Q32. C. Intermittent claudication. In what part of your leg do you feel it? [Visit 9] [Medical History Form, MHX]

variable.name: MHXC33
variable.description: Q33. C. Intermittent claudication. Do you get it if you walk uphill or hurry? [Visit 9] [Medical History Form, MHX]

variable.name: MHXC34
variable.description: Q34. C. Intermittent claudication. Do you get it if you walk at an ordinary pace on the level? [Visit 9] [Medical History Form, MHX]

variable.name: MHXC35
variable.description: Q35. C. Intermittent claudication. Does the pain ever disappear while you are walking? [Visit 9] [Medical History Form, MHX]

variable.name: MHXC36
variable.description: Q36. C. Intermittent claudication. What do you do if you get it when you are walking? [Visit 9] [Medical History Form, MHX]

variable.name: MHXC37
variable.description: Q37. C. Intermittent claudication. What happens to it if you stand still? [Visit 9] [Medical History Form, MHX]

variable.name: MHXC38
variable.description: Q38. C. Intermittent claudication. How soon? [Visit 9] [Medical History Form, MHX]

variable.name: MHXC39
variable.description: Q39. C. Intermittent claudication. Were you hospitalized for this problem in your legs? [Visit 9] [Medical History Form, MHX]

variable.name: MHXC40
variable.description: Q40. D. Congestive heart failure. Since your last Jackson Heart Study exam, have you had to sleep on 2 or more pillows to help you breathe? [Visit 9] [Medical History Form, MHX]

variable.name: MHXC41
variable.description: Q41. D. Congestive heart failure. Have you been awakened at night by trouble breathing? [Visit 9] [Medical History Form, MHX]

variable.name: MHXC42
variable.description: Q42. D. Congestive heart failure. Have you had swelling of your feet or ankles (excluding during pregnancy)? [Visit 9] [Medical History Form, MHX]

variable.name: MHXC43
variable.description: Q43. D. Congestive heart failure. Did it tend to come on during the day and go down overnight [excluding during pregnancy]? [Visit 9] [Medical History Form, MHX]

variable.name: MHXC44
variable.description: Q44. E. Invasive procedures. Since your last Jackson Heart Study exam, have you had surgery on your heart, or the arteries of your neck or legs, excluding surgery for varicose veins? [Visit 9] [Medical History Form, MHX]

variable.name: MHXC45A
variable.description: Q45a. E. Invasive procedures. Did you have coronary bypass? [Visit 9] [Medical History Form, MHX]

variable.name: MHXC45B1
variable.description: Q45b1. E. Invasive procedures. Other heart procedure [coronary bypass]? [Visit 9] [Medical History Form, MHX]

variable.name: MHXC45C
variable.description: Q45c. E. Invasive procedures. Did you have carotid endarterectomy [Visit 9] [Medical History Form, MHX]

variable.name: MHXC45D
variable.description: Q45d. E. Invasive procedures. Did you have carotid endarterectomy. Site: [Visit 9] [Medical History Form, MHX]

variable.name: MHXC45E1
variable.description: Q45e1. E. Invasive procedures. Other arterial revascularization or bypass [Visit 9] [Medical History Form, MHX]

variable.name: MHXC45F
variable.description: Q45f. E. Invasive procedures. Did you have any other type of surgery on your heart or the arteries of your neck or legs? [Visit 9] [Medical History Form, MHX]

variable.name: MHXC46
variable.description: Q46. E. Invasive procedures. Since your last Jackson Heart Study exam, have you had a balloon angioplasty on the arteries of your heart, neck, or legs? [Visit 9] [Medical History Form, MHX]

variable.name: MHXC47A
variable.description: Q47a. E. Invasive procedures. Did you have angioplasty of the coronary arteries? [Visit 9] [Medical History Form, MHX]

variable.name: MHXC47B
variable.description: Q47b. E. Invasive procedures. Did you have angioplasty in the arteries of your neck? [Visit 9] [Medical History Form, MHX]

variable.name: MHXC47C
variable.description: Q47c. E. Invasive procedures. Did you have angioplasty of lower extremity arteries? [Visit 9] [Medical History Form, MHX]

variable.name: MHXC48A
variable.description: Q48a. E. Invasive procedures. Since the last Jackson Heart Study exam have you had heart catheterization? [Visit 9] [Medical History Form, MHX]

variable.name: MHXC48A1
variable.description: Q48a1. E. Invasive procedures. What was the reason for this procedure [Heart catheterization]? [Visit 9] [Medical History Form, MHX]
variable.value: Follow up after heart attack or procedure (surgery or stent)

variable.name: MHXC48B
variable.description: Q48b. E. Invasive procedures. Since the last Jackson Heart Study exam have you carotid artery catheterization? [Visit 9] [Medical History Form, MHX]

variable.name: MHXC48B1
variable.description: Q48b1. E. Invasive procedures. What was the reason for this procedure [Carotid artery catheterization]? [Visit 9] [Medical History Form, MHX]

variable.name: MHXC48C1
variable.description: Q48c1. E. Invasive procedures. Since the last Jackson Heart Study exam have you carotid artery catheterization? Other arterial catheterization? [Visit 9] [Medical History Form, MHX]

variable.name: MHXC48C3
variable.description: Q48c3. E. Invasive procedures. What was the reason for this procedure [Other arterial catheterization]? [Visit 9] [Medical History Form, MHX]
variable.value: Leg pain on walking short distance

variable.name: MHXC49A
variable.description: Q49a. F. Diagnostic procedures. Since last Jackson Heart Study exam have you had echocardiogram? [Visit 9] [Medical History Form, MHX]

variable.name: MHXC49A1
variable.description: Q49a1. F. Diagnostic procedures. What was the reason for this procedure [echocardiogram]? [Visit 9] [Medical History Form, MHX]
variable.value: Follow up after heart attack or surge

variable.name: MHXC49B
variable.description: Q49b. F. Diagnostic procedures. Since last Jackson Heart Study exam have you had electrocardiogram? [Visit 9] [Medical History Form, MHX]

variable.name: MHXC49B1
variable.description: Q49b1. F. Diagnostic procedures. What was the reason for this procedure [electrocardiogram]? [Visit 9] [Medical History Form, MHX]

variable.name: MHXC49C
variable.description: Q49c. F. Diagnostic procedures. Since last Jackson Heart Study exam have you had treadmill or cardiac stress test? [Visit 9] [Medical History Form, MHX]

variable.name: MHXC49C1
variable.description: Q49c1. F. Diagnostic procedures. What was the reason for this procedure [treadmill or cardiac stress test]? [Visit 9] [Medical History Form, MHX]
variable.value: Follow up after heart attack or procedure

variable.name: MHXC49D
variable.description: Q49d. F. Diagnostic procedures. Since last Jackson Heart Study exam have you had MRI of the brain? [Visit 9] [Medical History Form, MHX]

variable.name: MHXC49D1
variable.description: Q49d1. F. Diagnostic procedures. What was the reason for this procedure [MRI of the brain]? [Visit 9] [Medical History Form, MHX]

variable.name: MHXCflag
variable.description: Data record present? [Visit 9] [Medical History Form, MHX]

variable.name: VERS
